definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: B    God is the all powerful creator and sustainer of the Universe.
sentences.chinese: 上帝是宇宙間萬能的創造者和支撐者。

sentences.english: He was responsible for our first system of communication based on electricity.
sentences.chinese: 他是我們的第一臺電力通信系統的創造者。

sentences.english: You are all divine sparks and divine creators.
sentences.chinese: 你全是神性之光和神聖創造者。

sentences.english: And he wants us to participate as creators.
sentences.chinese: 他也希望人們能參與其中，成爲創造者。

sentences.english: The impact the myth of Pangu, the creator of Heaven and Earth has on Chinese culture and beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 天地的創造者盤古的神話對中國文化和信仰的影響。

sentences.english: It’s aimed at teens, they say, and the creator is here.
sentences.chinese: 他的創造者說，他們的目標人羣是十幾歲的孩子們。

sentences.english: Only become the world creator could look on the world peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 做世界的創造者，纔會安然地看待萬物。

sentences.english: The creator gods would mix one kind with another to see what they could create.
sentences.chinese: 這些創造者與其它某類混合看看他們所創造得。

sentences.english: The people concourse is the contriver of history and beneficiary.
sentences.chinese: 人民羣衆是歷史的創造者和受益人。

sentences.english: As the Creator, God is ultimately responsible for evil coming into the world.
sentences.chinese: 作爲創造者，神最終要爲進入這個世界的邪惡負責任。

sentences.english: With this understanding, we can win the Almighty Creator and Destroyer.
sentences.chinese: 明白這一點，我們就能戰勝全能的創造者與毀害者。

sentences.english: We Pleiadians are associated with the creator gods that are bird like and reptilian.
sentences.chinese: 關於我們昴宿星人聯合像鳥和像爬蟲的衆神創造者。

sentences.english: Van der Sar went on to praise the longevity of the Reds' record appearance-maker.
sentences.chinese: 范德薩稱讚了曼聯出場紀錄的創造者。

sentences.english: You must accept that you're the creator of your life and that no one is coming to rescue you.
sentences.chinese: 你必須認爲自己是生活的創造者，沒有人會來拯捄你。

sentences.english: From the creators of Micro Counter Strike.
sentences.chinese: 從微觀反恐精英的創造者。

sentences.english: Now TV producers will re-shoot the plays.
sentences.chinese: 而目前，電視創造者又致力於對名著舉行翻拍。

definition: to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to enlighten/to explain (a text etc)/to stimulate (a mental attitude)/enlightenment/revelation/motivation
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
